SELECT SUBT1.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , Z.* , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ARM00001', Z.ARM_TYPE_CD, '1') AS ARM_TYPE_NM , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ARM00002', Z.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD, '1') AS ARM_SEND_TYPE_NM FROM ( SELECT Y.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARM_ID ,CASE USR_ID WHEN SEND_USR_ID THEN '03' ELSE '02' END AS ARM_TYPE_CD ,A.USR_ID ,SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '1') AS USR_NM ,A.SEND_USR_ID ,SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.SEND_USR_ID, '1') AS SEND_USR_NM ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.VIEW_CHECK ,A.DEL_CHECK ,A.SEND_DEL_CHECK ,A.REQ_IDS ,A.REG_DTM ,A.CHECK_DTM ,A.DEL_DTM ,A.SEND_DEL_DTM ,A.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD FROM ARM1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.DEL_CHECK = '02' UNION ALL SELECT B.ARM_ID ,'01' AS ARM_TYPE_CD ,B.USR_ID ,SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(B.USR_ID, '1') AS USR_NM ,B.SEND_USR_ID ,SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(B.SEND_USR_ID, '1') AS SEND_USR_NM ,B.TITLE ,B.CONTENT ,'01' AS VIEW_CHECK ,B.DEL_CHECK ,B.SEND_DEL_CHECK ,B.REQ_IDS ,B.REG_DTM ,B.CHECK_DTM ,B.DEL_DTM ,B.SEND_DEL_DTM ,B.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD FROM ARM1000 B WHERE 1=1 AND B.SEND_USR_ID = #usrId# AND B.SEND_DEL_CHECK = '02' AND B.SEND_USR_ID <> B.USR_ID ) Y ORDER BY Y.REG_DTM DESC, Y.CHECK_DTM ) Z ) SUBT1 WHERE SUBT1.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
AND SUBT1.SEND_USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND SUBT1.USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND SUBT1.TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND SUBT1.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND SUBT1.REQ_IDS LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND SUBT1.VIEW_CHECK = #searchCd#
AND SUBT1.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
AND SUBT1.SEND_USR_ID = SUBT1.USR_ID
AND SUBT1.ARM_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS ALL_CNT ,NVL(COUNT(DECODE(A.VIEW_CHECK,'02',1)),0) AS VIEW_CNT ,NVL(COUNT(DECODE(A.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD,'02',1)),0) AS SIGN_CNT ,NVL(COUNT(DECODE(A.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD,'03',1)),0) AS CHARGER_CNT FROM (SELECT Z.*, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(Z.USR_ID, '1') AS USR_NM, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(Z.SEND_USR_ID, '1') AS SEND_USR_NM FROM ARM1000 Z) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.DEL_CHECK = '02'
AND A.SEND_USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND A.USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND A.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND A.REQ_IDS LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND A.VIEW_CHECK = #searchTxt#
AND A.VIEW_CHECK = #searchCd#

SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(ARM_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ARM_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'ARM' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_ARM_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(ARM_ID) AS ARM_ID FROM ARM1000 )
INSERT INTO ARM1000 A ( ARM_ID, USR_ID, SEND_USR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_CHECK, DEL_CHECK, SEND_DEL_CHECK, REQ_IDS, ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD, REG_DTM ) VALUES ( #newArmId#, #usrId#, #sendUsrId#, #title#, #content#, '02', '02', '02', #reqIds#, #armSendTypeCd#, SYSDATE )
